title: How to deal with the “Claude crash”: Relx should keep buying back shares, then buy more
description: Relx remains confident even as the market flips from seeing it as an AI winner to fearing its profit margin will implode
content: As the FTSE 100 index bobs along close to all-time highs, it is easy to miss the quiet share price crash in one corner of the market. It’s got a name – the “Claude crash”, referencing the plug-in legal products added by the AI firm Anthropic to its C... [3758 chars]

title: Nations League draw: England to face Spain and Croatia, Wales meet holders Portugal
description: England will face Spain, Croatia and the Czech Republic in the 2026-27 Uefa Nations League group stage, while Wales are drawn with holders Portugal.
content:
England will face Spain, Croatia and the Czech Republic in the 2026-27 Uefa Nations League group stage, while Wales are in the same group as champions Portugal.
England and Wales, who will also play Denmark and Norway in a bid to qualify for the knoc... [2222 chars]

title: Union chief calls for Angela Rayner to replace Keir Starmer or risk Labour defeat to Reform UK
description: Exclusive: TSSA general secretary wants Rayner to take charge after Gorton byelection which she expects party to lose
content:
The head of a Labour-affiliated union has called for Angela Rayner to replace Keir Starmer, warning that Starmer risks leading the party into a heavy election defeat to Nigel Farage’s Reform UK.

title: 'We warned nursery about abuser Vincent Chan - they dismissed us,' parents tell BBC
description: The parents of two children who say they warned nursery staff about Chan tell the BBC they felt ignored.
content:
Parents who say they warned childcare bosses about a predatory nursery worker months before he was caught have told the BBC they felt ignored and were made to feel "hysterical".
Vincent Chan, who worked at Bright Horizons in north-west London, has be... [5656 chars]
